name: Pumpkin Runner
description:
This is a game I made in my own 48-hour game-dev challenge. Read more about it here: https://www.instagram.com/lenny_leonard_/

Be sure to read the story in the game's main menu. I may upgrade it by adding a coin system and other stuff like choosable characters.

If you find any bugs or similar issues, I'll be more than happy to hear from you.
